validUser.description: A user with valid credentials for a first-time successful registration.

userWithInvalidEmailFormat.description: A user profile with a syntactically incorrect email for registration.

userWithWeakPassword.description: A user with a password that is too weak.

alreadyRegisteredUser.description: A user who is already registered, to test duplicate registration failure.

alreadyRegisteredUserWithEmail.description: A user login with email who is already registered, to test valid login

alreadyRegisteredUserWithUsername.description: A user login with username who is already registered, to test valid login

incorrectPasswordForRegisteredEmail.description: logging in with an incorrect password associated with a registered email

nonRegisteredEmail.description: login with a non registered email

nonRegisteredUsername.description: login with a non registered username
